thread.title: ‘So the very same day I reordered a bigger, better flagpole’: Maryland woman shows her support for Trump
thread.title_full: ‘So the very same day I reordered a bigger, better flagpole’: Maryland woman shows her support for Trump

author: William A.
title: ‘So the very same day I reordered a bigger, better flagpole’: Maryland woman shows her support for Trump
text:
Sometime over Labor Day weekend, the first Trump flag [Linda Dement] put up over the summer was stolen, along with the 25-foot tall flagpole it was attached to. 
“So the very same day I reordered a bigger, better flagpole,” Dement said. 
The new pole is more than 30 feet tall, held in the ground with more than 400 pounds of concrete and protected by an invisible fence and surveillance cameras. 
“The next person that comes on my property [and] decides to steal what my hard working money pays for, they’d better make sure their Obamacare is paid up because they’re probably going to need it,” she said. 
WTOP adds that Dement, a home improvement general contractor, also has a Trump banner on display on her roof and “Trump 2016” spelled out in solar lights on her front lawn.
